subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yankees  Manager Joe Girardi will soon decide the second-most interesting position battle: Is it Curtis Granderson in center field and Brett Gardner in left on opening night in Boston, or the other way around?
snippet: Yankees  Manager Joe Girardi will soon decide the second-most interesting position battle: Is it Curtis Granderson in center field and Brett Gardner in left on opening night in Boston, or the other way around?
